result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Peter JA Green

defendant.name: Green, Peter JA
defendant.address: 921 N Michigan Street, Prairie du Chien, WI 53821

records.addlTxt:
11:22 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green appeared by telephone.  Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by video for Peter JA Green.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Moefu is heard. Defendant waives time limits for holding Preliminary Hearing
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on November 21, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

1:17 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by video for Peter JA Green. 

Attorney Moefu is heard on the qualification of a public defender for the defendant. 

State is heard on bond. Recommends his signature bond be converted to a $500.00 cash bond. 
Attorney Moefu is heard. Requests that the signature bond continue and stay the same. 
Defendant is heard. 
Court orders the signature bond stays the same. No change in bond, bond will remain as is.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 31, 2022 at 11:15 am.

2:10 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green not in court.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

State requests a warrant. 
Court orders a warrant. Defendant to be held for warrant.
Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement.

1:50 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green in court.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Defendant states understanding.  Right to counsel is explained. 
Defendant comments on court appointed Attorney. Requests Attorney Moefu. 

State requests a signature bond. Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement. 

Court sets bond at a $500.00 signature bond. Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
